snippet: Attention is turning to the mountain of debt European banks will have to refinance over the next two years, and institutions in countries like Portugal and Greece are likely to see their financing costs rise in the coming years.
abstract: Attention is turning to the mountain of debt European banks will have to refinance over the next two years, and institutions in countries like Portugal and Greece are likely to see their financing costs rise in the coming years.

headline.main: European Banks Face Rising Refinancing Costs
